document.full_text: the united states was attacked for its human rights record on friday as opponents including cuba and iran slammed its failure to close guantanamo bay and its decision to maintain military trials for terror suspects.
document.title: u.s. attacked by opponents at u.n. human rights body
lines_and_colors: the united states was attacked for its human rights record on friday as opponents including cuba and iran slammed its failure to close guantanamo bay and its decision to maintain military trials for terror suspects.
